name: GPT Repository Access
description: Vecto Pilot AI (GPT-5) plans, diffs, commits and PRs. Tokens stay in the browser.
longDescription: AI-powered repo editor for Replit: plan with GPT-5, generate diffs, stage/commit, open PRs, inspect logs, and tweak settings. Ships file handlers for .svg and .diff/.patch. Nothing leaves your browser unless you push.
